Text: RE Potential sale of Gomez lateral pipe Cc Kevin We have the TW Gomez Lateral files ready for viewing I will be back in the office Tuesday morning March if you want to come take a look Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept ECNa PO Box Houston TX voice fax Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday February PM To Westbrook Roger Subject FW Potential sale of Gomez lateral pipe Importance High Roger see note below Can you please have someone start pulling the ROW files for this pipe Once theyre available Id like to review them before we open them up to Pioneer thanks for the help Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday February AM To Monahans Team Bandel Bob Baker Robert Cc Schoolcraft Darrell Gadd Eric Subject Potential sale of Gomez lateral pipe Importance High Dear Team We are evaluating the potential sale of TWs existing inch diameter Gomez lateral in Pecos and Ward County Texas and have executed a confidentiality agreement with the proposed buyer Pioneer Gas Pipeline The buyer would like to begin the due diligence process as early as possible and has asked to review info related to the following Maintenance records for last years rightofway easement agreements The potential benefits to TW of this transaction include monetizing an asset that today is generating zero value and creating a new source of gas supply into TW from the buyer Questions I have are a Can we designate a point person from the Monahans Team that I can coordinate with and who would that be b Where who has the records documents for the items above Your timely response is greatly appreciated Please coordinate with me all questions concerns I ask that no information verbal or written be passed to any interested outside party without prior clearance with me thanks for your help I can be reached in Houston at Kevin Hyatt Director Asset Development

RE Potential sale of Gomez lateral pipeGood deal see you then Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept ECNa PO Box Houston TX voice fax Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent FW Potential sale of Gomez lateral pipe Cc All please see message below James already has this in a database So we will pull the files get reduced copies of the alignments and an exhibit for Pioneer to look at Pioneer is to call us to arrange a time James when we get this package ready to go please email Kevin Hyatt so that he can view the package prior to bringing in Pioneer Roger Westbrook RE FW BridgelineCrawfish ROW agreement My file ENRThis looks ok from a right of way standpoint Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept voice fax Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday November AM To Israni Rakhi Westbrook Roger Subject FW FW BridgelineCrawfish ROW agreement My file ENR Attached are my Louisiana counsels comments to our ROW form I agree with his changes Please review and let me know if you have any questions Original Message From P Keith Daigle ENRON Sent Saturday November PM To Nemec Gerald Subject Re FW BridgelineCrawfish ROW agreement My file ENR Gerald I reviewed the enclosed agreement and made several revisions I am enclosing a redlined version showing my revisions for your convenience My major revisions are summarized as follows I changed all references to rights of way or easement to servitude or sevitude of right of use Louisiana law does not use the terms easement or right of way I rearranged the last three clauses in the st paragraph for clarity I combined the content of the th paragraph into the d paragraph I change the th paragraph slightly to strengthen the rights retained by Grantor I added language to paragraph to give more detail to the process of abandonment and to strengthen the rights of the Grantor upon abandonment Please call with any questions or if you need further help with this Thank you for allowing me to provide professional advice on this matter Keith Nemec Gerald wrote Keith Could you look at this form and scrub it for Louisiana law issues Original Message From Israni Rakhi Sent Tuesday October PM To Nemec Gerald Subject BridgelineCrawfish ROW agreement Gerald Attached is a draft of the agreement for the ROWs requested by Bridgeline Would you please look it over and make any necessary changes Thanks Rakhi x Bridgeline easement ROW agmtdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Bridgeline easement ROW agmtdoc ContentDescription Bridgeline easement ROW agmtdoc ContentType applicationmsword ContentEncoding base ROW Agr AEnron with my redlinedoc File ROW Agr AEnron with my redlinedoc

Bridgeline Easements at Crawfish Facility Cc Attached for your review is Enrons standard document to a third party company Please let me know if you wish for the rightofway dept to assist in preparing the document and acquiring signatures Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept voice fax

RE Revised Forms Cc Gerald the legal matches with plats we have of the property I do have a faxed copy of a plat sent to me quite a while back but it does not contain ties to quarter sections or so I cant verify where exactly their pipe will sit Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept voice fax Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday September PM To Cc Westbrook Roger Israni Rakhi Johnson Patrick Subject Revised Forms Kyle Attached are the final versions of the Servitude Agreement and the Filing Form We made some changes to the form for consistency Please review Roger and Rakhi Please verify the legal description provided by Enterprise I also have a plat which I will forward to you for review After everyone has reviewed and approved we should be ready to go File LRCI IncAgreement doc File ServAgrFileFormdoc

RE LRCI Agreement Cc NonPrivilegedpst The note below asks about plats I do have a faxed copy of a plat but have not seen originals Are those still needed What is the status of the Bridgeline easement I do have some plats they sent over to me Roger Westbrook Enron Transportation Services Right of Way Dept voice fax Original Message From Johnson Patrick Sent Monday September PM To Israni Rakhi Westbrook Roger Subject FW LRCI Agreement Latest version of Sorrento ROW Rakhi please follow up and ensure that we receive payment upon execution of these documents It should be done by wire Annette Thompson or Karen Gruesen should be able to give you the appropriate wiring instructions The total cost agreed to was You should probably follow up with Gerald to ensure that the bill was prepared and sent Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday September PM To Kyle Webster ENRON Cc Johnson Patrick Subject RE LRCI Agreement Kyle Attached is the agreement with the two changes I discussed on my voice mail message Please review Do we have a property description and a plat File LRCI IncAgreement doc
